00466 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00467 {
00468     atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00469 }
00470 
00471 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00472 {
00473     atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00474 }

00484 /* --- spin lock services --- */
00527 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)                                 \
00528 {                                                                           \
00529     spl_t   s;                                                              \
00530                                                                             \
00531     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);                                         \
00532     code_block;                                                             \
00533     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);                                      \
00534 }

00623 #define rtdm_lock_get_irqsave(lock, context)    \
00624     rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock, context)
00625 
00643 #define rtdm_lock_put_irqrestore(lock, context) \
00644     rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock, context)

00662 #define rtdm_lock_irqsave(context)              \
00663     rthal_local_irq_save(context)

00737 static inline int rtdm_irq_request(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle,
00738                                    unsigned int irq_no,
00739                                    rtdm_irq_handler_t handler,
00740                                    unsigned long flags,
00741                                    const char *device_name,
00742                                    void *arg)
00743 {
00744     xnintr_init(irq_handle, irq_no, handler, NULL, flags);
00745     return xnintr_attach(irq_handle, arg);
00746 }
00747 
00748 static inline int rtdm_irq_free(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00749 {
00750     return xnintr_detach(irq_handle);
00751 }
00752 
00753 static inline int rtdm_irq_enable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00754 {
00755     return xnintr_enable(irq_handle);
00756 }
00757 
00758 static inline int rtdm_irq_disable(rtdm_irq_t *irq_handle)
00759 {
00760     return xnintr_disable(irq_handle);
00761 }

00764 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00765 
00771 typedef unsigned                    rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00772 
00782 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig);
00786 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00787                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler)
00788 {
00789     *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00790 
00791     if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00792         return -EAGAIN;
00793 
00794     rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, (rthal_irq_handler_t)handler, NULL, NULL,
00795                          IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00796     return 0;
00797 }
00798 
00799 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00800 {
00801     rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00802 }
00803 
00804 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00805 {
00806     rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00807 }

00849 {

00855 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
00856 {
00857     xnpod_renice_thread(task, priority);
00858     xnpod_schedule();
00859 }
00860 
00861 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task, uint64_t period)
00862 {
00863     return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
00864                                      xnpod_ns2ticks(period));
00865 }
00866 
00867 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
00868 {
00869     int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
00870 
00871     xnpod_schedule();
00872     return res;
00873 }
00874 
00875 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
00876 {
00877     return xnpod_current_thread();
00878 }
00879 
00880 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
00881 {
00882     return xnpod_wait_thread_period();
00883 }

00892 typedef uint64_t                    rtdm_toseq_t;
00893 
00894 static inline void rtdm_toseq_init(rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq, int64_t timeout)
00895 {
00896     *timeout_seq = xnpod_get_time() + xnpod_ns2ticks(timeout);
00897 }

00900 /* --- event services --- */
00901 
00902 typedef struct {
00903     unsigned long                   pending;
00904     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00905 } rtdm_event_t;
00906 
00907 static inline void rtdm_event_init(rtdm_event_t *event, unsigned long pending)
00908 {
00909     event->pending = pending;
00910     xnsynch_init(&event->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO);
00911 }
00912 
00913 void _rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
00914 
00915 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
00916 {
00917     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
00918 }
00919 
00920 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
00921 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, int64_t timeout,
00922                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
00923 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
00924 
00925 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
00926 {
00927     _rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
00928 }
00929 
00930 static inline void rtdm_event_clear(rtdm_event_t *event)
00931 {
00932     event->pending = 0;
00933 }

00960 /* --- mutex services --- */
00961 
00962 typedef struct {
00963     unsigned long                   locked;
00964     xnsynch_t                       synch_base;
00965 } rtdm_mutex_t;
00966 
00967 static inline void rtdm_mutex_init(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00968 {
00969     mutex->locked = 0;
00970     xnsynch_init(&mutex->synch_base, XNSYNCH_PRIO|XNSYNCH_PIP);
00971 }
00972 
00973 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
00974 {
00975     _rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
00976 }
00977

00998 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
00999                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01000 {
01001     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, ptr, size);
01002 }
01003 
01004 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01005                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01006 {
01007     return __xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_WRITE, ptr, size);
01008 }
01009 
01010 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01011                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01012                                       size_t size)
01013 {
01014     return __xn_copy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01015 }
01016 
01017 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01018                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01019                                     size_t size)
01020 {
01021     return __xn_copy_to_user(user_info, dst, src, size);
01022 }
01023 
01024 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01025                                          char *dst,
01026                                          const char __user *src,
01027                                          size_t count)
01028 {
01029     if (unlikely(__xn_access_ok(user_info, VERIFY_READ, src, 1)))
01030         return -EFAULT;
01031     return __xn_strncpy_from_user(user_info, dst, src, count);
01032 }

01034 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01035 {
01036     return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01037 }
